channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AK

item.title: Report X-2024040720
item.description:
Report X-2024040720

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-19T15:12:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-11
  • City: ANCHORAGE
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: AT THE UPS FACILITY IN ANCHORAGE, ALASKA SIX PACKAGES SHIPPING FROM USA TO HONG KONG WERE INSPECTED PRIOR TO EXPORT. INSPECTION REVEALED MULTIPLE SAMSUNG CELL PHONES IN EACH PACKAGE. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOXES. ADDITIONAL TRACKING NUMBERS IN THE SHIPMENT ARE 1Z81Y7E86777785250, 1Z81Y7E86777619662, 1Z81Y7E86778945076, 1Z81Y7E86777861480 AND 1Z81Y7E86776468890. TRACKING 1Z81Y7E86777341845 CONTAINS (80) CELL PHONES. TRACKING 1Z81Y7E86777785250 CONTAINS (45) CELL PHONES. TRACKING 1Z81Y7E86777619662 CONTAINS (80) CELL PHONES. TRACKING 1Z81Y7E86778945076 CONTAINS (70) CELL PHONES. TRACKING 1Z81Y7E86777861480 CONTAINS (70) CELL PHONES AND TRACKING 1Z81Y7E86776468890 CONTAINS (67) CELL PHONES. ALL INNER PACKAGES HAVE OLD FEDEX LABELS WITH UN3481 LITHIUM BATTERY MARKINGS APPLIED EXCEPT TRACKING 1Z81Y7E86777785250. THESE PACKAGES WERE SHIPPED FROM CALIFORNIA USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER 81Y7E8, NICE CHOICE INC., 2525 VISTA INDUSTRIA, COMPTON CA 90221-3200.

item.title: Report X-2024040725
item.description:
Report X-2024040725

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-19T15:12:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-06
  • City: ANCHORAGE
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On April 6th a drum was found with damage on the bottom and leaking during the Am sort. The drum marked as UN3082, Environmentally hazardous substance, liquid n.o.s., 9, III. The drum was placed into a steel salvage drum and is pending disposition.
